document.full_text: power company exelon corp  is to buy rival constellation energy group  for $7.9 billion, the latest in a series of deals in a fragmented u.s. utility industry that faces new costs to upgrade power grids and meet environmental controls.
document.title: exelon to buy constellation energy for $7.9 billion
